data.title: ALLKrules~~Your Number 1 Er Clip Site~~Make Your Request Today~~http:
data.text:
Image of the Month

News and Updates:

Sept. 19: Several updates have been added to the site, rules, episodes, and both our personal pages.

May 17: Sorry its been a wile since I updated this site. I am not going to continue added the top requests and subscribers to the index page because its to hard to keep track with. Some of the rules have changed and I have updated the episode guide. I have also changed the banner. I also removed the guest book since no one was signing it. We will also have a new image of the moth. We also have added a new Poll. Some of the rules have also been changed.

April 4: Little bit of Bio update on Mandy, Latest 5 request added, Update on Episode name, added more episodes from Martineke, and updated the samples.

March 16: I change a few things on the site and added the last 5 episode request completed.

March 09: Added 9.12 A Saint in the City and 11.09 Twas the Night, New poll has been added poll will change each month.

March 08:Sorry for the late updates to the website I have been gone for the past few weeks because of my internet being disconnected. -Mandy, Today I have added the last 5 request that that have been added to the channel. I also updated our bios.

Welcome to ALLKrules ER clip request site. We are 2 fans who are obsessed with ER. I am Mandy and my partner is Martineke. Here you will be able to request clips from any of the episodes in seasons 1 to 13. We also have season 14 but currently we are only taking request for the first 10 episodes till June. All videos will be posted on the ALLKrules You Tube Channel. We now have over 600 subscribers.

Here is how you can request:

Send us a Message on YouTube you must be a subscriber to request.

Here is the format in which the messages should be sent.

Episode Name:

Episode Number: (7.06) "The seven is the season and the 06 is the episode in that season. Please do not put 180 as the episode number because that gets confusing."

Characters or Story line:

Clips Quality: Chose one of these for Quality:Dark: Sample

Normal: Sample

Bright: Sample (Best for a lot of outside night scenes) Black and White: (No Sample at this time)

Other: Explain You need to look and see what episodes are available by clicking episodes on the top.

Request Limited to 2 request every a month per subscriber. We will no longer do double request unless the request goes along with the 1st request's story line. An Example would be Blood Line and Graduation Day "Abby and Luka storyline." If your request is under 4 min we will send you a link to upload it on your own channel. If you do not know how please let us know and we will help you. Request will be made in the order they are received. If you do not get a response with in a week please resend your clip request.

Due to Request Volume and time restrictions all request may not be met in a timely fashion. If you start pressuring us your request will not be added to the site. We both have other commitments.

If you would like to receive the video each time we put new ones up please add us to your friends.

Current Time Richmond, VA USA Los Angeles, CA USA Brussels, Belgium

For your Clock Click here...
